explains: adj. 会众的；公理教会的

sentences.en: These two historical psalms would have been for congregational use.
sentences.cn: 这两篇诗篇都可以用在会所中。

sentences.en: One of the least frequent is the congregational form so familiar in the West.
sentences.cn: 其中最频繁的是公理的形式非常熟悉在西方。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the structure was detached from the ground to become congregational and waiting Spaces for patients.
sentences.cn: 同时，建筑的底层架空，形成了为病人服务的公众聚集和等待空间。
